product_name: CycleOps Fluid2 Bike Trainer with Training Kit - 2014
long_description: With resistance suited to advanced cyclists and a bundle of extras to maximize indoor training, the CycleOps Fluid2 bike trainer with training kit offers quiet operation and a smooth, roadlike feel.
short_description: With resistance suited to advanced cyclists and a bundle of extras to maximize indoor training, the CycleOps Fluid2 bike trainer with training kit offers quiet operation and a smooth, roadlike feel.
